cp510.assignments.geo_shape

Class GeoLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • cp510.assignments.geo_shape.GeoShape
      • cp510.assignments.geo_shape.GeoLine

  • public class GeoLine
extends GeoShape
    The GeoLine class for UW java 510 assignment 4 (GeoShape part 1). The GeoLine class extends the GeoShape class. It contains getters and setters for start and end properties, as well as a method to calculate the length of a line. This class encapsulates a line.
    Author:
    Toby Peterson.

               GeoPoint end)
        throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        The constructor (2 parameter) for the GeoLine class. It sets the start and endpoints of this line to the given values. Sets the edgeColor and edgeWidth properties to the defaults (DEFAULT_EDGE_COLOR and DEFAULT_EDGE_WIDTH) and sets the color property to null.

        public GeoPoint getEnd()
        The getEnd method for GeoLine. Returns the end point of this line.
        Returns:

      • setEnd

        public void setEnd(GeoPoint end)
        The setEnd method for GeoLine. Sets the end point of this line to the given value. The given value must not be null; if it is null, a NullPointerException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        end - The intended end point of the given line.

      • getStart

        public GeoPoint getStart()
        The getStart method for GeoLine. Returns the starting point of this line.The starting point of the line is determined by the origin, which is stored in the GeoShape superclass.
        Returns:
        The start point of the line.

      • setStart

        public void setStart(GeoPoint start)
        The setStart method for GeoLine. Sets the starting point of the line. Calling this method is equivalent to calling setOrigin(GeoPoint).
        Parameters:
        start - The intended start point of the given line.

      • length

        public double length()
        The length method for GeoLine. Returns the length of this line.
        Returns:
        The length of the given line.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The toString method for GeoLine. Returns a string describing the properties of this line.
        Overrides:
        toString in class GeoShape
        Returns:
        A human readable string of the origin,color and end values for the generated line.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D gtx)
        The draw method for GeoLine. This method is used to draw the given shape on a GeoPlane eventually.
        Specified by:
        draw in class GeoShape
        Parameters:
        gtx - The context to use for drawing this shape.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.awt.Color color)
        The setColor method for GeoLine. This method overrides the GeoShape.setColor(Color) method. It does nothing. It is present merely to prevent the color property in the GeoShape class from being set to a non-null value.
        Overrides:
        setColor in class GeoShape
        Parameters:
        color - The fill color of the generated shape. This is converted into a string format.
